info.name: IntroVox
info.summary: Interactive onboarding tour for new Nextcloud users
info.description:
IntroVox provides a user-friendly guided tour that helps new users get started with Nextcloud.
**Features:** * Interactive step-by-step tour through Nextcloud's main features * Full admin interface for customizing tour steps per language * Multi-language support (6 languages: EN, NL, DE, DA, FR, SV) * Import/export functionality for easy tour configuration sharing * Global enable/disable control for administrators * Language-specific tour availability management * Personal settings for users to restart or permanently disable the tour * Automatically adapts to your Nextcloud theme (light, dark, high contrast) * Privacy-focused: tour completion status stored locally
**Perfect for:** * Nextcloud administrators who want to improve user onboarding * Organizations deploying Nextcloud to new users * Multi-language organizations with diverse user bases * Anyone who wants to help users discover Nextcloud features
Built with Vue 3 and Shepherd.js for a smooth, modern user experience.
info.author: Rik Dekker
